schema.name: Healthyfied Naked Burrito

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the cauliflower under cold water and chop it into small pieces.
Dice the red capsicum and red onion.
In a pan, melt the butter over medium heat and sauté the cauliflower until it starts to soften, about 5 minutes.
Add the lean beef to the pan, breaking it apart with a spoon. Cook until browned, about 10 minutes.
Stir in the spices (marjoram, oregano, paprika, cumin), salt, and pepper. Cook for an additional 2 minutes to blend the flavors.
Add the diced capsicum and red onion to the pan. Cook until they are soft, about 5 minutes.
Sprinkle the Parmesan cheese over the burrito mix and stir until melted and well combined.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

schema.description: This Healthyfied Naked Burrito packs a punch with its high-protein, high-fiber ingredients while keeping an eye on health. Seasoned with spices like marjoram, dried oregano, paprika, and cumin, it's a flavorful take on healthy eating. Perfect for those on a quest for Healthy Recipes that don't skimp on taste!
